Asmodee

Repo

  • Custom element architecture:

    Modular ES6 web components communicating via shared variant-change and custom events, keeping complex interactions decoupled and maintainable at scale.

  • Product comparison system:

    localStorage-powered product comparison with Section Rendering API support, available as both a drawer and modal with dynamically fetched product data.

  • Quick Add drawer:

    AJAX-driven product drawer with full variant support, hover-based prefetching for faster interactions, and safe request cancellation to prevent race conditions.

  • Variant-aware media galleries:

    Swiper-based galleries that re-filter and reinitialise when variants change, supporting slider and stacked layouts with optional media grouping by variant option.

  • Dynamic metafield system:

    Flexible product metafield rendering with conditional visibility, logged-in-only rules, and defensive handling for missing or incomplete data.

  • SparkLayer B2B pricing:

    Custom element integration with SparkLayer enabling dynamic B2B pricing, VAT calculations, price breaks, and customer-specific pricing via the SparkLayer API.

  • Internationalization support:

    RTL language detection with responsive country and language localization forms that adapt between header and mobile navigation.

  • Store locator:

    Dual integration with Storemapper and Stockist.co widgets, allowing flexible store finder implementations across multiple page types.

Castle Fine Art

Repo

  • Nosto Integration:

    Nosto placement blocks are used across product, collection, homepage, search, cart, and 404 pages. The cart drawer includes cross-sell recommendations, and cart updates are tracked for personalization. A main-collection-no-nosto section allows excluding Nosto on specific collections.

  • Artist Hub System:

    Artist metaobjects power dynamic artist showcases with featured works pulled from metafields, supporting multiple featured collections with intelligent fallback logic to ensure consistent 4-image displays across artist profiles.

  • Event Management Architecture:

    Comprehensive event system built on metaobjects with location-specific drawers, embedded registration forms via Globo Formbuilder, dynamic media galleries (video/image), and date-based filtering for upcoming/past events with automatic status detection.

  • Custom Finance Drawer:

    Advanced V12 finance calculator with interactive deposit slider, real-time payment plan calculations, Klarna integration, and expandable option cards. Features dynamic APR calculations, loan amount validation, and responsive modal/drawer presentation with market-specific finance product availability.

  • Recently Viewed Products Drawer:

    Sophisticated recently viewed drawer system with auto-open on homepage return, session-based visibility controls, custom scrollbar with hover states, and configurable display rules (once per page type, days before showing again). Includes header icon integration and localStorage/sessionStorage tracking for optimal UX.

Charles Owen

Repo

  • Metafield colour swatches:

    Solid and gradient swatches generated from colour_swatch metafields.

  • Faux variant navigation:

    Colour switching handled via sibling product metafield references instead of native variants.

  • Web component architecture:

    50+ ES6 custom elements communicating via shared, event-driven logic.

  • Expivi 3D integration - Not launched:

    Custom integration of Expiviâ€™s 3D product configurator.

  • Quick Add drawer:

    AJAX-loaded product drawer with full variant support and safe request cancellation.

  • Variant-aware galleries:

    Swiper-based galleries that dynamically update in response to variant changes.

The Fine Cheese Co

Repo

  • Metafield-driven product info:

    Nutrition, ingredients, allergens, and store/serve content managed via metafields and surfaced through accordions and a full-screen modal.

  • Dietary badges system:

    Metaobject-powered dietary icons with tooltips, shown on PDPs and product cards with flexible display modes.

  • Bundle contents display:

    Bundle items rendered from metafield lists, including per-item quantities and linked nutritional modals.

  • Events calendar:

    Custom events section with date, location, pricing, animations, and flexible layouts.

  • Delivery countdown logic:

    Web component calculating delivery dates with weekday rules, blackout periods, and live countdown timers.

  • Type & origin blocks:

    Product blocks pulling cheese type and origin from metafields with configurable styling.

  • Draft product filtering:

    Metafield-based draft logic to hide products from collections/search while allowing direct access.

  • Quick Add drawer:

    AJAX product drawer with variant support, accessibility handling, and request cancellation.

  • Variant-aware galleries:

    Swiper galleries that re-filter and reinitialise based on the selected variant.

Ted Baker

Repo

  • Metafield colour swatches:

    Colour selection built from sibling product metafields, parsing colours from product titles and generating solid or gradient swatches via theme settings.

  • Gift card handling:

    All gift card product links redirect to the Givy app to avoid regional and app URL issues.

  • Web component architecture:

    50+ ES6 custom elements communicate via shared variant change events, keeping the system modular and maintainable.

  • International SEO:

    Automatic hreflang output and smart URL rewriting for UK, EU, and US markets.

  • Quick Add drawer:

    AJAX-loaded product drawer with full variant support, accessibility safeguards, and safe request cancellation.

  • Variant-aware galleries:

    Swiper-based galleries that re-filter and reinitialise per variant, supporting multiple layout modes.

Vintage Sofa

Repo

  • High-complexity architecture:

    Large custom JS footprint (custom-async.js ~5.8k lines) powering advanced AJAX features, variant logic, drawers, and metafield-driven behaviour, requiring strong Liquid and JS expertise.

  • Klaviyo integration:

    Onsite tracking, back-in-stock notifications, custom-styled modals via theme settings, and detailed cart/add-to-cart event tracking.

  • Reviews.io integration:

    Review widgets across PDPs, collections, and homepage with custom carousels, filtering, verified badges, media support, and brand-aligned styling.

  • Advanced cart drawer:

    AJAX cart with undo actions, delay timers, free-shipping progress, real-time updates, quantity rule validation, and variant metafield display (dimensions, delivery).

  • Live search system:

    Predictive search drawer with debouncing, multi-resource results, suggestions, overlay mode, and mobile-optimised UX.

  • Complex variant selection:

    Swatches, buttons, and dropdowns with availability logic, disabled states, dynamic pricing, variant images, and metafield syncing.

  • Recently viewed products:

    localStorage-based tracking with configurable limits, deduplication, FIFO handling, and editor-safe initialisation.

  • Quickshop drawer:

    Full product preview drawer with complete variant logic, selling plans, AJAX cart support, and module re-initialisation.

  • Metafield-driven features:

    Variant-specific USPs, dimensions, delivery metaobjects, file downloads, and JSON-based data for fast switching.

  • Filtering & sorting:

    Advanced collection filters with drawers or static layouts, price sliders, active filters, show-more logic, and clean URL parameter management.
